alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Macon; Marion; Peach; Schley; Taylor (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Macon, central Marion, southwestern Peach, south central Crawford, central Schley and southern Taylor Counties through 1230 PM EDT... At 1200 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Tazewell, or near Buena Vista, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Fort Valley, Buena Vista, Butler, Ellaville, Oglethorpe, Montezuma, Marshallville, Reynolds, Ideal, Brantley, Murrays Crossroads, Whitewater State Park, Nakomis, Rupert, Oakland, Tazewell, Clearview, Doyle, Saint Louis and Fountainville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
